issue.title: www.emag.ro
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.emag.ro/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2F) ### Comment > Hi! Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. This I don't know if it's because of Adguard or not but it just became a problem in the past week, out of the blue. > > Thank you. Have a good day! ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> Hello, As far as I can see, most of these banners are loaded from ad servers, like `googlesyndication.com`, `doubleclick.net`, so it rather shouldn't be unblocked.
> 
> I have added a rule (filters update should be available in 1-2 hours) which should cause that banners which are not loaded by ad servers should be displayed (like on a screenshot below), but clearing cache or refreshing website using `Ctrl+F5` might be required.
> 
> Screenshot
> If you want to see banners from ad servers then please disable protection on this website.

So I did disable protection, in Chrome, for this site, I've deleted the cookies and browsing data and I still only see those banners if I'm logged out on the eMag site. If I disable Adguard protection completely  on my windows system, the banner is working....

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.emag.ro/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.emag.ro%2F) ### Comment > Hi! Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. This I don't know if it's because of Adguard or not but it just became a problem in the past week, out of the blue. > > Thank you. Have a good day! ### Screenshots

comment.body:
If I'm not wrong, this website display different banners when it "detects" ad blocker and I see few banners with AdGuard enabled.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/190848088-81ea2191-fd1a-4e12-9fc0-940d3284f271.png)

</details>

What happens if do not disable protection and clear website cache and update filters?
Do you see some banners or not (like on a screenshot above)?

These blocked banners are loaded from `doubleclick.net`/`googlesyndication.com` and are embedded in iframes, so technically they are Google ads.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/190848976-ac8505ae-337f-45e3-a6f0-d051116be0f7.png)

</details>

You can try to add these rules:
```adblock
@@||emag.ro^$urlblock,elemhide
@@||tpc.googlesyndication.com^$domain=safeframe.googlesyndication.com
```
to user rules. It should unblocks these ads, but I don't recommend it, because it may also unblock ads on other websites.

Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it anymore.
Please check if these buttons work correctly if you add this rule:
```adblock
$script,redirect-rule=noopjs,domain=sammobile.com
```
to user rules.

If website will still not work correctly, then please disable filter lists on by one and check which one causes this issue.

By the way, I think that it's worth to note that these buttons work after a while (1-5 seconds) when website is fully loaded and the same happens without any ad blocker.

Please include this site as a false positive: https://www.emag.ro/ The main banners are not showing, when logged in my account, on a PC if Adguard protection is ON. This is a online store and they have great offers on that main banners and I would like to see it, in my browsers. I even used a reset on my PC for Adguard to cancel a hidden rule but it still not showing anything. > > Also, I think that it would be great that the Adguard assistant settings to also have a Unblock ad on this website option. I my case if I did push, by mistake, pushed the Block ad on this website and clicked on the main banner region I could easy and without any special knowledge undo my problem. That is why I've used the Adguard reset on my PC, but that did not worked. > > I saw that when I order something, sometimes when the pay section of the site is on display, on PC the screen is just white and I can't finish to process my payments. So without Adguard protection been disabled, I've cleared the Chrome
cookies asd updated the filters from Adguard. In the screen with the banner
visible I am not logged in, the other one shows what I see from my account.
I did not add the provided rules since I only want to see the banner on
eMag site, not on others. I did pushed, a long time ago, the assistant
button block ad on this website and from that moment, I never say the
banner when I logged in. That is why I requested an unblock an ad from this
website to be available. Even if this could not be resolved, that unblock
would really help and much appreciated!
